action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A kitchen with white cabinets and a large island in the center. The island has glass doors on the front and a countertop made of a light-colored material. There is a stainless steel refrigerator on the right side of the image, and a window with an arched top behind it. The floor is made of wood, and there is a floral wallpaper on the walls. There is a chandelier hanging from the ceiling, and a table with two chairs in the foreground. There is a bowl of fruit on the table.
